metadata.name: Mountain Hostel
metadata.description:
Mountain Hostel it's a proposed Project which was never built. Here you can teleport in the mountains, feel the cold and at the same time the murmur of the mountains talking to the lonely building.

1080 x 1350px  / 30fps  / 30sec mp4
Illustrator: Zuko Ka
Animator: KVAN

*This NFT includes a physical token**
• Only the first collector can claim the physical token
• Metacrilated premium quality physical token, 30x42 cm (A3)
• QR code that will allow the collector to be linked to the NFT.
